content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary, thank you for your interest in my apartment. I appreciate your time and consideration. As a landlord, I am always looking to maximize my gains and ensure that my investment is well taken care of. That being said, I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
TERMINATE

I'm sorry, I need to terminate the negotiation as I have found a better deal elsewhere. Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: I understand, Mary. Thank you for letting me know. I appreciate your time and consideration as well. If you have any other questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 900 Euros per month.

I am happy with the price and I would like to proceed with the rental agreement. Can you send me the lease agreement for me to review?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Of course, Mary. I am glad to hear that you are happy with the rental price of 900 Euros per month. I will send you the lease agreement for your review as soon as possible. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
